testsuite.name: stepDef.CucumberTest

testcase.name: Test the functionality of the "Place Order" button
Test the functionality of the "Close" button in the Place Order form
Test the functionality of the "Delete" button in the Place Order form
Test the functionality of the Place Order form normal
Test the functionality of the Place Order form without a name
Test the functionality of the Place Order form without a credit card information
Test the functionality of the "Place Order" button to place multiple orders
Test the functionality of the contact form normal
Test the functionality of the close button in the contact form
Test the functionality of the contact form with invalid contact email
Test the functionality of the contact form with invalid contact name
Test the functionality of the contact form without a message
Test the functionality of the carousel previous button
Test the functionality of the carousel next button
Test the functionality of "Phones" category
Test the functionality of "Laptops" category
Test the functionality of "Monitors" category
Test the functionality of "Contact" button
Test the functionality of "About us" button
Test the functionality of "Cart" button
Test the functionality of "Login" button
Test the functionality of "Signup" button
Test the functionality of the "previous and next products" button
Test the functionality of the Login form normal
Test the functionality of the Login form without a username
Test the functionality of the Login form without a password
Test the functionality of the Login form with an unregistered username
Test the functionality of the Logout button
Test the functionality of "Samsung galaxy six" title button
Test the functionality of "Nokia lumia 1520" title button
Test the functionality of "Nexus six" title button
Test the functionality of "Samsung galaxy seven" title button
Test the functionality of "Iphone six" title button
Test the functionality of the "Add to cart" button
Test the functionality of the Signup form normal
Test the functionality of the Signup form without a username
Test the functionality of the Signup form without a password
Test the functionality of the Signup form with a taken username
Test the functionality of the Close button in the Signup form
